skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has an additional 30% chance of inflicting a critical hit if the target is under a [Decrease DEF] debuff.
skills.name: The Harder They Fall
skills.books:

Level 3: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Has a 20% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns when attacking targets with higher DEF than this Champion. Has a 20% chance of decreasing the damage taken by 20% when attacked by enemies with higher ATK than this Champion.
skills.name: Furious Defense [P]
skills.books:
Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
